meanings.definition: A thin, flat cake of batter fried on both sides on a griddle.
meanings.sent1: Mom made delicious pancakes for breakfast.
meanings.sent2: I love adding syrup to my pancakes.
meanings.sent3: The pancake race at the fair was hilarious.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as warm and comforting as a stack of pancakes.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of freshly cooked pancakes filled the kitchen.

meanings.definition: A flat cake of thin batter fried or baked on both sides, usually in a pan.
meanings.sent1: We enjoyed fluffy pancakes at the brunch.
meanings.sent3: The pancake tower at the party was a hit.
meanings.sent4: The city skyline looked like a stack of pancakes in the morning fog.
meanings.sent5: The waiter brought out a steaming plate of pancakes.
